item.title: Australians share their thoughts with Kleenex about cleanliness
item.description:
Source: Kleenex. Kimberly-Clark’s toilet tissue brand, Kleenex, has released findings about Australian attitudes towards cleanliness alongside their new Kleenex Luxury Collection. Nearly one-third of Australians (32%) believe they could be cleaner. Over 80% (84%) would avoid a first date if they didn’t feel clean. Feeling clean significantly impacts emotions: Australians associate cleanliness with feeling refreshed (84%) and more confident (48%). When compared to topics like sex, religion, politics, and finances, half of those surveyed found “cleaning your intimate area” the most difficult to discuss...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/australians-share-their-thoughts-with-kleenex-about-cleanliness/

item.title: Discover Clark by participating in the CLARK BIKE TOUR this July
item.description:
Source: PDOT. The Philippines Department of Tourism (PDOT), alongside the Clark Development Corporation, announced the upcoming CLARK BIKE TOUR happening in July. This bike tour aims to raise awareness about the significance of health and wellness as a way of life while promoting travel and tourism. It also seeks to highlight Clark as a bike-friendly area. The event, scheduled for July 30 at the parade ground, anticipates around 400 road bikers, forming 100 teams of four members each, to engage in a non-competitive day-long tour of different attractions within the freeport zone...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/discover-clark-by-participating-in-the-clark-bike-tour-this-july/
